RACE.RACE_TEXT: PENN NATIONAL RACE 1 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 91. Allowance Purse 28000. (PLUS UP TO 40% PABF) FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON A RACE OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, STARTER, OR PENNSYLVANIA BRED. Three Year Olds, 123 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since October 30 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since Sept ember 30 Allowed 4 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $16,000 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: TUDOX OPPORTUNITY tracked the pace four wide, made a three wide bid on the turn, then drew out in the furlong grounds to prove best, driving. WASABI BOY prompted the pace three wide, then fell off the pace leaving the five sixteenths two wide, then ran on to gain the place award late. MAGIC SPIN hustled up the inside to set the early pace, then was headed off the turn and faded the final furlong, lost place award late, bested rest. MEAN MACHINE was reserved early, came three wide into the lane, angled in by the furlong marker and had a belated rally on the inside. ON THE RIM was settled, three wide on the turn, came wide into the lane and had no rally. ACT OF VALOR was well placed early on the inside and weakened.

ENTRY.NAME: Magic Spin
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled inside, set pace inside, faded 1/8, lost 2nd late

ENTRY.NAME: Act of Valor
ENTRY.COMMENT: well placed inside, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: Mean Machine
ENTRY.COMMENT: reserved early, came 3 wide, angled in, belatedly

ENTRY.NAME: Wasabi Boy
ENTRY.COMMENT: prompted pace 3 wide, 2 wide turn, got 2nd late

ENTRY.NAME: On the Rim
ENTRY.COMMENT: allowed to settle, 3 wide turn, came wide, no rally,

ENTRY.NAME: Tudox Opportunity
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked pace 4 wide, bid 3 wide, drew clear, driving,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: PENN NATIONAL RACE 2 1 1/16M Dirt CR: 83. Starter Optional Claiming Purse 19000. (PLUS UP TO 40% PABF) FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE STARTED FOR A CLAIMING PRICE OF $16,000 OR LESS AND WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES OR CLAIMING PRICE $16,000 AND WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 123 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since October 30 Allowed 2 lbs. Such A Race Since September 30 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $16,000 (Races Where Entered For $12,500 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SKIMBLE SHANKS tracked the early pace, then split rivals by the five eighths marker and went up to stalk the pacesetter, made a three wide bid leaving the quarter pole and then slowly edged clear in the final furlong to prove best, driving. ROAN FOR THE ROSE was two wide into the first turn while vying for the lead, then went on to set the pace, then was headed leaving the turn and dug in gamely but was out-kicked by the winner, second best. ORASHI was settled back early, then made a two to three wide move on the turn to loom boldly off the turn, but flattened out, got show award late. RUNYONESQUE was settled early on the inside, shifted out nearing the five sixteenths to make a four wide bid, loom boldly off the turn but flattened out, lost show award late. LA PAZ stalked the early pace three wide and tired. HANFORD was reserved early and failed to menace. HOLY MOLY MOSES was well placed along the inside, then was ridden along leaving the three eighths and then was empty the final quarter of a mile.

ENTRY.NAME: Holy Moly Moses
ENTRY.COMMENT: well placed inside, ridden along 3/8, empty stretch,

ENTRY.NAME: Roan for the Rose
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pace, headed upper stretch, dug in gamely, out-kicked

ENTRY.NAME: La Paz
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace 3 wide, tired

ENTRY.NAME: Runyonesque
ENTRY.COMMENT: allowed to settle inside, bid 4 wide upper stretch, flattened out

ENTRY.NAME: Skimble Shanks
ENTRY.OWNER: Rock Bottom Ranch and Warrior's Reward LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked pace, split 5/8, stalked, bid 3 wide, long drive,clear

ENTRY.NAME: Orashi
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled back, inside turn, bid 2 wide, flattened out, got 3rd

ENTRY.NAME: Hanford
ENTRY.COMMENT: reserved early, failed to menace,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: PENN NATIONAL RACE 3 5F Dirt CR: 53. Maiden Claiming Purse 13600. (PLUS UP TO 40% PABF) FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 123 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Claiming Price $10,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: DISCO DAISY set a pressured pace on the inside and made a bid leaving the turn and kicked clear, then remained clear to the wire to prove best, driving. DIVINE PROMISE was settled early, four wide five wide on the turn and had a good late rally. CITY OF LONDON pressed the pace and made a three wide bid on the turn but flattened out. GEMINI WARRIOR chased the pace and lacked the needed stretch bid. TRAJEC HOLIDAY was off slowly, then passed the tiring rivals. WITHOUT A NET pressed the pace in between rivals and weakened. TEMPTRESS CALLING was settled two wide on the turn and weakened. FANTASY FROST was not a factor. MADISON COUNTY was settled on the inside and dropped back.

ENTRY.NAME: Madison County
ENTRY.OWNER: Nefeli Chris and Dina St LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: allowed to settle, inside trip, dropped back,

ENTRY.NAME: Temptress Calling
ENTRY.COMMENT: allowed to settle, 2 wide turn, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: Gemini Warrior
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased pace, needed stretch bid

ENTRY.NAME: Disco Daisy
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pressured pace inside, bid upper stretch, kicked clear

ENTRY.NAME: Trajec Holiday
ENTRY.OWNER: Albright George R and Hughes Alfred A
ENTRY.COMMENT: off slowly, passed tiring rivals,

ENTRY.NAME: Without a Net
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace between horses, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: City of London
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace 3 wide, bid 3 wide, flattened out,

ENTRY.NAME: Fantasy Frost
ENTRY.COMMENT: no factor,

ENTRY.NAME: Divine Promise
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled early outside, 4-5 wide turn, late rally,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: PENN NATIONAL RACE 4 1M Dirt CR: 95. Allowance Optional Claiming Purse 31600. FOR REGISTERED PA-BRED THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO PA-RESTRICTED RACE(S) OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, OR STARTER OR CLAIMING PRICE $25,000 OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES. Three Year Olds, 123 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners O f A Race At A Mile Or Over Since October 30 Allowed 2 lbs. Such A Race Since September 30 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $25,000 (Races Where Entered For $16,000 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: JAYJAYDEE stalked the early pace three wide, then pressed the pacesetter two wide on the far turn, made a bid off the turn and slowly edged clear to prove best, driving. DR. STEVE was five wide into the first turn, then vied for the lead three wide by the six furlong marker, then went on to set the pace on the inside, then was headed by the quarter pole and dug in gamely but was outfinished late, second best. TRENDING UP was settled early, made a five wide middle move down the backstretch, then made a three wide bid on the turn and came four wide into the lane, but flattened out, held show award. EAGLES CRY was allowed to settle early, wide on the backstretch and lacked the needed winning bid late. P JS SILVER DUKE chased the pace four wide and had no rally. JUMP FOR THE WIN was inside into the first turn, then shifted out to track the pace in between rivals, then dropped to the inside on the turn and weakened. RADIEUX was reserved early, four wide on the turn and had no response. RUBY BLEU vied for the lead on the inside and stopped.

ENTRY.NAME: Jump for the Win
ENTRY.COMMENT: inside first turn, tracked between, inside turn, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: Ruby Bleu
ENTRY.OWNER: Premier Stable and Brown Jr Donald L
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied for lead inside, stopped

ENTRY.NAME: Radieux
ENTRY.OWNER: Mikelle Farms LLC and Morales Marilyn I
ENTRY.COMMENT: reserved early, 4 wide turn, failed to respond,

ENTRY.NAME: Eagles Cry
ENTRY.COMMENT: allowed to settle, wide backstretch, needed stretch bid

ENTRY.NAME: Trending Up
ENTRY.COMMENT: allowed to settle, middle move 5 wide, 3 wide turn, held 3rd

ENTRY.NAME: Jayjaydee
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace 3 wide, bid 2 wide, slowly edged clear, driving,

ENTRY.NAME: P Js Silver Duke
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased pace 4 wide, no rally,

ENTRY.NAME: Dr. Steve
ENTRY.COMMENT: 5 wide first turn, vied 3 wide, pace inside, headed 1/4,outkicked

RACE.RACE_TEXT: PENN NATIONAL RACE 5 6F Dirt CR: 67. Maiden Claiming Purse 18100. (PLUS UP TO 40% PABF) FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 123 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Claiming Price $25,000, if for $22,500, allowed 2 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MOONSHINE WARRIOR set the pace on the inside and was headed leaving the furlong marker and dug in gamely to hold on under a drive. VIROLOGIST prompted the pace and made a bid between rivals leaving the turn and fought on to just miss. BACK ON STAGE stalked the early pace three wide, made a four wide bid off the turn but hung. GET LOADED was allowed to settle early, came five wide into the lane and finished well but needed more. B B QUEEN was well placed on the inside and weakened in the lane. UPTOWN CHARLY GIRL was reserved early and lacked a rally.

ENTRY.NAME: B B Queen
ENTRY.COMMENT: well placed inside, saved ground turn, weakened stretch,

ENTRY.NAME: Uptown Charly Girl
ENTRY.COMMENT: reserved early, lacked rally

ENTRY.NAME: Moonshine Warrior
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pace inside, dug in gamely stretch, held on, driving,

ENTRY.NAME: Get Loaded
ENTRY.COMMENT: allowed to settle, came 5 wide, rallied

ENTRY.NAME: Virologist
ENTRY.COMMENT: prompted pace, bid between horses, missed

ENTRY.NAME: Back On Stage
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace 3 wide, bid 4 wide, hung

RACE.RACE_TEXT: PENN NATIONAL RACE 6 6F Dirt CR: 84. Claiming Purse 16400. (PLUS UP TO 40% PABF) FOR FILLIES THREE YEARS OLD OR FILLIES AND MARES FOUR YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES. Three Year Olds, 122 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since October 30 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since September 30 Al lowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $10,000, if for $9,000, allowed 2 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: IN GOOD TROUBLE dueled for the lead on the inside, made a bid to shake clear by the quarter pole, then was two wide off the turn while clear, then turned back a late bid from PHANCY PHILLY in deep stretch to prove best, driving. PHANCY PHILLY was well rated early on the inside, cut the corner off the turn and made a inside bid in the lane but was out gamed late. ME DARLIN KATHLEEN dueled for the lead to the outside of the winner and was three wide off the turn but weakened in the drive.

ENTRY.NAME: Phancy Philly
ENTRY.COMMENT: well rated inside, bid inside, outgamed

ENTRY.NAME: In Good Trouble
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled inside, bid 1/4, shook clear, repelled late bid, driving,

ENTRY.NAME: Me Darlin Kathleen
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled outside, 3 wide turn, weakened,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: PENN NATIONAL RACE 7 6F Dirt CR: 72. Claiming Purse 10800. (PLUS UP TO 40% PABF) FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON TWO RACES SINCE MAY 30. Three Year Olds, 123 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since October 30 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: JACK'S LILLY was settled early two wide, shifted out out the quarter pole, came five wide into the lane, closed well on the outside to get up in time, driving. KIRBY was well rated early on the inside, made a three wide bid by the quarter pole, came off the turn four wide and clear lead late but was caught on the wire to just miss. CHLOE ROSE set a pressured pace on the inside, headed by the quarter pole and faded in the drive, held show award. FIELD LETTERS was off slowly, came three wide off the turn but lacked a serious rally. ZIPPY JO pressed the pace two wide and weakened.

ENTRY.NAME: Kirby
ENTRY.COMMENT: well rated inside, bid 3 wide 1/4, clear upper, caught

ENTRY.NAME: Jack's Lilly
ENTRY.COMMENT: allowed to settle 2 wide, came 5 wide, closed well, up in time

ENTRY.NAME: Field Letters
ENTRY.COMMENT: off slowly, came 3 wide upper stretch, no rally,

ENTRY.NAME: Chloe Rose
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pressured pace inside, headed 1/4, faded, held 3rd

ENTRY.NAME: Zippy Jo
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace 2 wide, weakened,
